definition: please don't be upset/no hard feelings/absit iniuria verbis/let injury by words be absent
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
